posts.post_title: Needs: Camnitz Arms down, Rockefeld, and Demmitt STL - Low grade raw to PSA/SGC 2.
posts.post_content: Hi Folks.  I''m down to three (maybe 4) t206.  I need Camnitz Arms down (posted earlier maybe, but I can't find it), Rockenfeld, and Demmitt STL.  Low grade raw to PSA/SGC 2 or so.  I might need an Ardnt too.  I can't find him.  Let me know if you have any!  Thanks (mccarthy789 here, Frank S. Dean on FB, Mike McCarthy in real life).  Appreciate it...
Only Demmitt STL left (an easy one)...I’m definitely a low grade buyer.  Thanks.
